DOC.brief_summary: The investigators want to assess the effectivity of different sample volumes in blood cultures.
DOC.brief_title: Finding Ideal Blood Culture Volume in NICU
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators intend to compare yield of 0.5ml sample x2 vs 0.25 ml samples x2 (aerobic and anaerobic media for each volume) taken from the sample taken from the same site and time. Time to positivity will also be compared, as well as possible contamination rates.
DOC.criteria: Suspected sepsis Need for extra puncture in order to withdraw enough blood for the second set of cultures. Urgent need for antibiotic without time for cultures.
